statements: SELECT * FROM library_inventory;
SELECT book_title, location FROM library_inventory WHERE status='available';
SELECT book_title, status FROM library_inventory WHERE location='Library A' ORDER BY book_title DESC;
SELECT book_title, borrowing_history FROM library_inventory WHERE status='borrowed' LIMIT 5;
SELECT book_id, location FROM library_inventory WHERE status='available' AND location <> 'Library B';
SELECT book_title, location FROM library_inventory WHERE status='available';
SELECT * FROM library_inventory WHERE book_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT book_title, borrowing_history FROM library_inventory WHERE location='Main Library' AND status='checked-out';
SELECT * FROM library_inventory ORDER BY location ASC, status DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_books, location FROM library_inventory GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT book_title, book_author FROM books WHERE book_status = 'available';
SELECT book_title, book_author, book_location FROM books ORDER BY book_author ASC;
SELECT book_title, book_author, book_location FROM books WHERE book_status = 'borrowed' ORDER BY book_title DESC;
SELECT borrow_id, borrower_name, borrow_date FROM borrows ORDER BY borrow_date DESC;
SELECT book_id, book_title, book_author FROM books WHERE book_status='available' ORDER BY book_title DESC
SELECT book_id, book_title, book_author, book_location FROM books WHERE book_author='JK Rowling' ORDER BY book_location ASC, book_title

SELECT borrows.borrow_id, borrows.borrower_name, books.book_title, borrows.borrow_date FROM borrows JOIN books ON borrows.book_id = books.book_id WHERE borrows.borrow_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY borrows.borrower_name ASC

SELECT borrows.borrow_id, books.book_title, borrows.borrow_date, borrows.return_date FROM borrows JOIN books ON borrows.book_id = books.book_id ORDER BY borrows.return_date DESC, borrows.borrow_date ASC

SELECT books.book_title, books.book_author, borrows.borrower_name, borrows.borrow_date, borrows.return_date FROM books JOIN borrows ON books.book_id = borrows.book_id WHERE books.book_status='available' AND borrows.return_date IS NULL ORDER BY borrows.borrow_date ASC
SELECT * FROM book_location;
SELECT book_id, status FROM book_status;
SELECT borrower_id, book_id, borrow_date, return_date FROM borrowing_history WHERE return_date IS NULL;
SELECT shelf_number, aisle_number FROM book_location WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM borrowing_history WHERE borrow_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM book_location WHERE aisle_number > 5 ORDER BY shelf_number DESC;
SELECT book_id, status FROM book_status WHERE status = 'Available';
SELECT borrower_id, book_id, borrow_date FROM borrowing_history WHERE borrow_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY borrow_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_id, shelf_number, aisle_number FROM book_location WHERE location_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR shelf_number BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM borrowing_history WHERE borrower_id = 100 ORDER BY return_date DESC, borrow_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT book_id, title, author FROM books WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT title, author, location FROM books ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM book_status WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT title, author, location FROM books WHERE book_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE author='Stephen King' AND location='Library';
SELECT book_id, title, author, location, availability FROM books b JOIN book_status bs ON b.book_id = bs.book_id WHERE bs.availability = TRUE;

SELECT b.title, br.name AS borrower_name, bh.borrow_date AS 'date_borrowed', bh.return_date AS 'date_returned' FROM books b JOIN borrowing_history bh ON b.book_id = bh.book_id JOIN borrowers br ON bh.borrower_id = br.borrower_id ORDER BY bh.borrow_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'total_books', SUM(CAST(bs.availability AS INTEGER)) AS 'available_books' FROM books b JOIN book_status bs ON b.book_id = bs.book_id;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE location = 'Library';
SELECT book_id, title, author, status FROM books WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT * FROM book_borrowers ORDER BY borrower_name ASC;
SELECT book_id, genre_name FROM books JOIN book_genre_mapping ON books.book_id = book_genre_mapping.book_id JOIN book_genres ON book_genre_mapping.genre_id = book_genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE status = 'Available';
SELECT book_id, title, author FROM books WHERE status = 'Borrowed' ORDER BY author, title DESC;
SELECT book_id, title, author, location, status FROM books WHERE status != 'Lost' AND location LIKE 'Shelf%';
SELECT book_id, title, author FROM books JOIN book_borrow_history ON books.book_id = book_borrow_history.book_id WHERE borrow_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT b.title, bg.genre_name FROM books b JOIN book_genre_mapping bgm ON b.book_id = bgm.book_id JOIN book_genres bg ON bgm.genre_id = bg.genre_id ORDER BY bg.genre_name, b.title DESC;
